code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/ResidentCommunication.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ResidentCommunication(){const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[newMessage,setNewMessage]=useState('');const handleSendMessage=()=>{setMessages([...messages,{text:newMessage,timestamp:new Date()}]);setNewMessage('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"resident-communication",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"headerContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Resident Communication"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Stay in touch with property management securely."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"messageContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Messages"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"messageList",children:messages.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No messages yet."}):messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:msg.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:msg.timestamp.toString()})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"newMessage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:newMessage,onChange:e=>setNewMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type your message..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSendMessage,children:"Send Message"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notificationContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Community Events & Updates"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You are all caught up with the latest events and updates in your building!"})]})]});}export default ResidentCommunication;
